all-modules.title: Active-Auras
all-modules.description: Active-Auras

all-modules.name: CommunityLighting
all-modules.title: CommunityLighting by Blitz
all-modules.description: Community Lighting Module for ambient light animations! Add your lights via GitHub PR, or just use the lights added by others in your games!

all-modules.name: Dynamic-Effects-SRD
all-modules.title: Dynamic Active Effects SRD
all-modules.description: DnD 5e SRD items, features and spells configured for Dynamic Active Effects, MQoL and AT

all-modules.name: ShowDragDistance
all-modules.title: Show Drag Distance
all-modules.description: Shows the distance you're dragging a token, similar to holding the ctrl key. Because 30 feet isn't as much as it sounds. Also removes the contraint of the normal ruler to hold CTRL and drag from Token. Now you can just press CTRL with token selected and it will show you the range from your token to mouse!

all-modules.name: _document-sheet-registrar
all-modules.title: Lib: Document Sheet Registrar
all-modules.description: A library module which enables the registration of alternative document sheets for all document types that don't normally have this capacity.

all-modules.name: advanced-macros
all-modules.title: Advanced Macros
all-modules.description: Use handlebars templating, recursive macro calls and call macros with arguments or directly from chat.

all-modules.name: award-xp
all-modules.title: Award XP
all-modules.description: Award Experience to the group, which will be devided between the players and automatically added their character sheets.

all-modules.name: better-rolltables
all-modules.title: Better Roll Tables
all-modules.description: Adding functionality to roll tables, especially to roll treasure and magic items

all-modules.name: better-target
all-modules.title: Better Target
all-modules.description: The default target indicator can be difficult to see in tight confines, or crowded rooms. This module changes the target indicator to a crosshair that renders over the targeted token.

all-modules.name: calendar-weather
all-modules.title: Calendar/Weather
all-modules.description: Adds a customizable calendar with events and weather.

all-modules.name: chat-portrait
all-modules.title: Chat Portrait
all-modules.description: Display the Actor's portrait and colors on the Chat Message.

all-modules.name: colorsettings
all-modules.title: lib - Color Settings
all-modules.description: Library that allows modules to add color settings and forms.

all-modules.name: combat-enhancements
all-modules.title: Combat Enhancements
all-modules.description: Adds health tracking and drag/drop re-ordering to the combat tracker.

all-modules.name: combat-utility-belt
all-modules.title: Combat Utility Belt
all-modules.description: Adds various combat-focused features

all-modules.name: custom-hotbar
all-modules.title: Custom Hotbar
all-modules.description: An extra fully functional hotbar (currently 1 row only) above the first.

all-modules.name: dae
all-modules.title: Dynamic effects using Active Effects
all-modules.description: replacement for dynamic effects

all-modules.name: ddb-importer
all-modules.title: D&D Beyond Importer
all-modules.description: Import your dndbeyond.com characters, spells, monsters, and adventures at super speed!

all-modules.name: dfreds-pocket-change
all-modules.title: DFreds Pocket Change
all-modules.description: Automatically adds money to NPC character sheets when dropped on the canvas based on the DMG's individual treasures table. This is best used with Loot Sheet NPC 5e.

all-modules.name: dice-calculator
all-modules.title: Dice Tray
all-modules.description: Adds a dice tray below chat, and turns the d20 near chat into a dice calculator.

all-modules.name: dice-so-nice
all-modules.title: Dice So Nice!
all-modules.description: Adds the ability to show a nice 3D dice simulation when a roll is made.

all-modules.name: dnd-ui
all-modules.title: DnD5e Ui
all-modules.description:
Theme for DnD5e.

*** Rejoignez la communaut√© Francophone: Francophone Discord

all-modules.name: dnd5e-helpers
all-modules.title: DnD5e Helpers
all-modules.description: Little helpers for little tasks.

all-modules.name: easy-target
all-modules.title: Easy Target
all-modules.description: Target tokens with alt+click.

all-modules.name: find-the-culprit
all-modules.title: Find the culprit
all-modules.description:
This module helps you to find a module causing issues, by automating the process of deactivating and reactivating modules.
Just click the 'Find the culprit' button inside Module Management.

all-modules.name: forien-unidentified-items
all-modules.title: Forien's Unidentified Items
all-modules.description: Provides system agnostic solution to handle unidentified items and their identification.

all-modules.name: foundry-combat-focus
all-modules.title: Combat Focus
all-modules.description: Shows the chat window on the combat tracker tab as well - no more switching between the two tabs during combat!

all-modules.name: foundry_community_macros
all-modules.title: Foundry Community Macros
all-modules.description:
This is a collection of Macros added by the FoundryVTT Community!

You can add your own macros by making a pull request here: https://github.com/foundry-vtt-community/macros

all-modules.name: foundry_community_tables
all-modules.title: Foundry Community Tables
all-modules.description:
This is a collection of Tables added by the FoundryVTT Community!

You can add your own tables by making a pull request here: https://github.com/foundry-vtt-community/tables

all-modules.name: foundryvtt-simple-calendar
all-modules.title: Simple Calendar
all-modules.description: A simple calendar module for keeping track of game days and events.

all-modules.name: fxmaster
all-modules.title: FXMaster
all-modules.description: Adds various weather and filter effects

all-modules.name: image-hover
all-modules.title: Image Hover
all-modules.description: This module allows users to see the character art while hovering over a token.

all-modules.name: itemacro
all-modules.title: Item Macro
all-modules.description: A module that allows macros to be stored in items and executed in various places.

all-modules.name: jaamod
all-modules.title: Jinker's Animated Art Pack
all-modules.description:
Collection of Animated Art for use with VTT's in the top-down/overhead perspective. All files are in transparent webm format. Files will be located in your Data/modules/jaamod/AnimatedArt folder.

If you like my work consider becoming a Patron to ensure I keep creating content for Foundry. Preview Page

all-modules.name: jb2a_patreon
all-modules.title: JB2A - Patreon Complete Collection
all-modules.description:
This pack is a replacement for our free module.

This library of carefully crafted animated assets such as spell templates, tokens and tiles will bring life to your sessions. They are based on the DnD5e ruleset but can be used with other systems as you see fit.

Compendiums of actors and macros are also provided. Go to our FAQ and Troubleshooting section if you have a question or an issue. Join our Discord server for any further question or if you want to exchange with the community.

all-modules.name: laptop-fix
all-modules.title: Laptop Form Fix
all-modules.description: Fixes issues where a few apps(SceneConfig and Filepicker) will put the submit button off screen. Restructured html/css so that the submit button is always visible.

all-modules.name: lib-changelogs
all-modules.title: Changelogs
all-modules.description: Show changelogs of module in a non intrusive way.

all-modules.name: lib-df-hotkeys
all-modules.title: Library: DF Hotkeys
all-modules.description: Library for providing a way for modules to register keyboard shortcuts

all-modules.name: lib-wrapper
all-modules.title: libWrapper
all-modules.description: Library for wrapping core Foundry VTT methods, meant to improve compatibility between packages that wrap the same methods.

all-modules.name: lmrtfy
all-modules.title: Let Me Roll That For You!
all-modules.description: Ask your players to make rolls for you.

all-modules.name: lootsheetnpc5e
all-modules.title: Loot Sheet NPC 5e
all-modules.description: This module adds an additional NPC sheet which can be used for loot containers such as chests or shopkeepers.

all-modules.name: lordudice
all-modules.title: Lordu's Custom Dice for Dice So Nice
all-modules.description: Additional Dice presets and themes for Dice So Nice. Requires Dice So Nice module to work.

all-modules.name: macroeditor
all-modules.title: Macro Editor
all-modules.description: Better code editor for macros.

all-modules.name: maestro
all-modules.title: Maestro
all-modules.description: Adds new sound-related features such as Hype Tracks and Item Tracks

all-modules.name: magicitems
all-modules.title: Magic Items
all-modules.description: Module that adds the ability to create magical items with spells or feats that belong to the item itself, such as staffs or magic wands, which will be automatically inherited from the character who owns the item.

all-modules.name: midi-qol
all-modules.title: Midi QOL
all-modules.description: Automates rolling weapon/spell attacks and applying damage

all-modules.name: midi-srd
all-modules.title: Midi SRD
all-modules.description: DnD 5e SRD items, features and spells configured for Dynamic Active Effects and Midi QoL

all-modules.name: monks-active-tiles
all-modules.title: Monk's Active Tile Triggers
all-modules.description: Want to teleport, or open doors, or hide characters, or display a message, or play a sound, or change a token's elevation when a token walks over a tile... now you can

all-modules.name: monks-enhanced-journal
all-modules.title: Monk's Enhanced Journal
all-modules.description: Treat the journal like it's going to be popped out and used as a digital guide book.  Add extra information to summarize an encounter.  Show summaries of people and places.  Allow for bookmarking of commonly used pages

all-modules.name: monks-little-details
all-modules.title: Monk's Little Details
all-modules.description: Things to tidy up the interface and flow

all-modules.name: monks-tokenbar
all-modules.title: Monk's TokenBar
all-modules.description: Add a bar with all the current player tokens.  Limit movement, roll saving throws, assign XP.

all-modules.name: multilevel-tokens
all-modules.title: Multilevel Tokens
all-modules.description:
Adds several helpful token automation features, particularly (but not only) suited to maps with multiple levels.

Teleport tokens to another location when they move into a particular region (e.g. from the bottom of a staircase to the top). Clone tokens from one region to another, syncing movement and other property updates (e.g. allowing players to "see" what is happening on floors below). Trigger macros when a token enters or leaves a particular region.

See page at URL below for full usage instructions.

all-modules.name: navbar-tweaks
all-modules.title: Navbar Tweaks
all-modules.description: Provides some tweaks for the Navbar

all-modules.name: nice-more-dice
all-modules.title: Nice More Dice
all-modules.description: Adds a bunch of dice textures and a few dice faces to DsN.

all-modules.name: pings
all-modules.title: Pings
all-modules.description: Allows pinging on the map

all-modules.name: poi-sheet
all-modules.title: Point of Interest Sheet
all-modules.description: A very simple alternate sheet that allows actors to be used as Points of Interest if map notes don't work for you.

all-modules.name: settings-extender
all-modules.title: Settings Extender
all-modules.description: Extends the settings menu, adding additional types for configuration values.

all-modules.name: socketlib
all-modules.title: socketlib
all-modules.description: A library for easier handling of foundry sockets

all-modules.name: splatter
all-modules.title: Splatter
all-modules.description: Blood up your games

all-modules.name: tidy-ui_game-settings
all-modules.title: Tidy UI - Game Settings
all-modules.description: User Interface Improvements for the Game Settings Window

all-modules.name: tidy5e-sheet
all-modules.title: Tidy5e Sheet
all-modules.description: Replaces the default D&D 5e character and NPC sheet with an alternate layout focused on a cleaner UI

all-modules.name: times-up
all-modules.title: times-up
all-modules.description: Active expiry expiration

all-modules.name: token-action-hud
all-modules.title: Token Action HUD
all-modules.description: Creates a HUD showing a selected token's common actions.

all-modules.name: token-hud-wildcard
all-modules.title: Token HUD Wildcard
all-modules.description: This module adds a button to the Token HUD if the token has wildcard set and detects more than 1 image to choose from. Pressing the button displays a panel on the right side of the HUD with buttons for each image, pressing one of these allows to change the token image.

all-modules.name: token-mold
all-modules.title: Token Mold
all-modules.description:
Gives the option to cast your tokens into a mold of your choosing.

Possible options for your mold include:

  • Adding incrementing number suffixes.
  • Name generation for tokens.
  • Random adjective prefixes. (Examples: angry, calm, bloodthirsty, ...)
  • Rolling Hit Points by formula (dnd5e only)
  • Set token configuration on placement.
  • Providing an overlay to quickly check some stats on token hover.
  • Automatic creature size scaling (dnd5e only)

all-modules.name: tokenmagic
all-modules.title: Token Magic FX
all-modules.description: Add special effects and animations on your tokens, tiles, drawings and templates.

all-modules.name: torch
all-modules.title: Torch
all-modules.description: Torch HUD Controls

all-modules.name: trigger-happy
all-modules.title: Trigger Happy
all-modules.description: Automate everything in your world by creating triggers for your players to spring traps or anything you can think of!

all-modules.name: turnmarker
all-modules.title: Turn Marker
all-modules.description: Displays a (optionally animated) marker on the token who's active turn it is. Originally by Brunhine

all-modules.name: vtta-tokenizer
all-modules.title: Tokenizer
all-modules.description: Tiny yet capable in-game token editor

all-modules.name: wcube
all-modules.title: Dice So Nice - Weighted Companion Cube Dice Set
all-modules.description: Adds a set of 3D dice in the style of Aperture Science Weighted Companion Cube to Dice-So-Nice

all-modules.name: world-scripter
all-modules.title: World Scripter
all-modules.description: Allow you to write a script in game which executes as if it was a world script.
